description: No parking is allowed on Snow Routes when there is two or more inches on the ground regardless of date or time. To view or use this KML file, special GIS software such Google Earth is required. To download this file, right-click the "Download" link above and choose "Save link as."

To view or use this KML file, special GIS software such Google Earth is required. To download this file, right-click the "Download" link above and choose "Save link as."

name: Snow Route Parking Restrictions - KML
